title: Coinbase’s $400 Million Breach: What Really Happened And How Did Customers Get Exposed?
body: Coinbase’s $400 million data breach is again in the spotlight after new information came to light about the company’s prior knowledge of the leak. The COIN stock is still up over 4% from yesterday’s trading session despite this new development. Coinbase Was Aware Of the Data Breach Since January According to a Reuters report , crypto exchange Coinbase was aware of the $400 million customer data leak as early as January. The report revealed that at least one part of the breach occurred when an India-based employee of the exchange’s outsourcing firm, TaskUs, was caught taking photographs of her work system with her phone. Coinbase had revealed in a May 14 SEC filing that it had received an extortion email from the threat actors who were in possession of the leaked data. The exchange stated that the threat actor appeared to have obtained this information by paying multiple overseas contractors or employees to collect this information from internal Coinbase systems . Furthermore, in the filing, Coinbase only mentioned that they had independently detected this data breach in the “previous months,” without stating when exactly they first had knowledge of it. Meanwhile, it assured that the improper data access was part of a single campaign and that the incident did not involve the compromise of passwords or private keys. Coinbase stated that the affected data includes personal details, masked Social Security numbers, government ID images, account data, and limited corporate information. The crypto exchange had also fired the personnel involved in the data breach and warned affected customers about the breach. The exchange estimated the preliminary expenses in the breach to be between $180 million and $400 million for remediation costs and voluntary customer reimbursements. The Reuters report mentioned that over 200 TaskUs employees were later fired in a mass layoff that drew Indian media attention. Based on the SEC filing, Coinbase had totally cut ties with TaskUS as the exchange revealed that it was in the process of opening a new support hub in the US. The exchange claimed that it has also taken other measures to harden its defenses to prevent this type of incident. The Exchange’s Legal Battle Against Oregon Amid this data breach, Coinbase is also battling a lawsuit against Oregon for the alleged sale of unregistered securities. In an X post , the exchange’s Vice President of Legal, Ryan VanGrack, commented on their decision to move for the case to be transferred to a federal court. He explained that the case is fundamentally about federal law, which is the reason for this move. VanGrack added that Oregon’s Attorney General would undermine recent bipartisan progress towards crypto clarity by creating a “patchwork” of state regulations that harm consumers, innovation, and economic freedom. Coinbase’s Chief Legal Officer (CLO), Paul Grewal, noted that Oregon’s claims raise fundamentally federal issues like the meaning of “investment contract,” and so they should be resolved by federal courts.

title: Bitcoin Price Crash Below $100,000 Still Possible: Analysts Issue Downtrend Warnings
body: Despite the recent rally to a new all-time high (ATH) of $111,900, crypto analysts have warned that the Bitcoin price could still witness a massive crash that will send it below $100,000. These analysts highlighted fundamentals and technicals that could spark this price crash. Analysts Highlight Why Bitcoin Price Could Still Crash Below $100,000 In a TradingView post, crypto analyst Stephan mentioned the geopolitical tensions, with the Russia-Ukraine conflict intensifying as one of the factors that could spark the Bitcoin price crash. He explained how this conflict could drive investors toward safe-haven assets, such as gold. The analyst also noted that Bitcoin ETFs experienced modest outflows last week. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Crash To $104,000: What You Need To Know In June Stephan’s accompanying chart showed that the Bitcoin price could drop to as low as $96,765 as it retests the psychological $100,000 support level. Crypto analyst Nova also warned that Bitcoin could drop to $100,000 while providing a technical analysis of the flagship crypto’s current price action. In a TradingView post, Nova stated that if the Bitcoin price faces resistance around the $106,406 daily level and continues to correct, it could extend the decline to retest the psychologically important $100,000 mark. She further revealed that the Relative Strength Index (RSI) on the daily chart is at 53, trending downwards to the neutral level of 50. This indicates weakening bullish momentum. Nova also stated that the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) showed a bearish crossover last week. Meanwhile, the analyst alluded to the increasing red histogram bars below the baseline, which she claimed further signal a potential correction ahead. Her accompanying chart showed that the Bitcoin price could drop to $99,000 as it retests the $100,000 level. Crypto analyst Kevin Capital also called for caution at the current Bitcoin price level. He stated that nothing has changed for the flagship crypto and indicated that there was no need to be ultra bullish at this current level. The analyst earlier warned that things could get sketchy looking for BTC if it fails to reclaim $106,800 soon enough. BTC Could Still Rally To $135,000 This Year In an X post, crypto analyst Titan of Crypto raised the possibility of the Bitcoin price rallying to $135,000 this year. He noted that BTC has broken out of a right-angled descending broadening wedge, and if the price holds above the breakout zone, $135,000 becomes a realistic target. The analyst added that the structure is clean. Related Reading: Head And Shoulders Pattern Says Bitcoin Price Is Headed Down Toward $95,000 Crypto analyst Mikybull Crypto stated that the Bitcoin price is gearing up for a new all-time high. He further remarked that $120,000 remains a magnet for the flagship crypto in this market cycle. Meanwhile, veteran trader Peter Brandt predicted that BTC could reach $150,000 by late summer 2025. At the time of writing, the Bitcoin price is trading at around $105,400, down in the last 24 hours, according to data from CoinMarketCap. Featured image from Getty Images, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Unlock Weekly Income with Global X’s New Bitcoin Covered Call ETF (BCCC)
body: BitcoinWorld Unlock Weekly Income with Global X’s New Bitcoin Covered Call ETF (BCCC) Are you looking for ways to potentially generate regular income from the exciting world of digital assets? The launch of a new Bitcoin ETF is often big news, and Global X, a well-known name in the ETF space and the U.S. subsidiary of Mirae Asset, has just introduced an interesting one: the Bitcoin Covered Call ETF, trading under the ticker symbol BCCC . Unlike typical Bitcoin ETFs that aim to track the price of Bitcoin directly, the Global X BCCC is designed with a specific goal in mind: generating income. It achieves this by employing a sophisticated financial technique known as a Covered Call strategy. This approach allows investors to gain exposure to the Bitcoin market dynamics, albeit indirectly, while potentially receiving regular payouts, specifically targeting Weekly Income distributions. What is the Global X BCCC and How Does it Work? The Global X Bitcoin Covered Call ETF ( BCCC ) isn’t your average spot Bitcoin fund. Instead of holding physical Bitcoin, the fund gains exposure by investing in other Bitcoin exchange-traded products (ETPs). The core of its strategy lies in writing (selling) call options on these underlying Bitcoin ETPs. This is the ‘covered call’ part of the strategy. Think of it this way: the fund owns the underlying Bitcoin exposure (via ETPs) and then sells the right (a call option) for someone else to buy that exposure at a specific price (the strike price) by a certain date (the expiration date). In return for selling this right, the fund receives a premium. This premium is the primary source of the income the fund aims to distribute. Here’s a simple breakdown: The fund holds underlying Bitcoin exposure (through ETPs). It sells call options on this exposure. It collects premiums from selling these options. These premiums are used to generate Weekly Income for shareholders. This structure allows investors to participate in the Bitcoin market’s potential upside, while also benefiting from the income generated by the options strategy, all within the familiar structure of a Bitcoin ETF . Exploring the Covered Call Strategy: A Closer Look The Covered Call strategy is a popular approach in traditional finance for generating income from assets like stocks. Applying it to Bitcoin ETPs brings this established method to the digital asset space. A covered call involves owning the underlying asset (or exposure to it, in BCCC’s case) and selling a call option on that same asset. The seller of the call option receives a premium upfront. In return, they give the buyer the right to purchase the underlying asset at a predetermined price (the strike price) before the option expires. If the price of the underlying asset stays below the strike price, the option expires worthless, and the seller keeps the premium. If the price rises above the strike price, the option is likely to be exercised, meaning the seller might have to sell the underlying asset at the strike price. For the Global X BCCC, this means: The fund collects premiums, which contribute to the Weekly Income distributions. The fund’s participation in potential large price increases of Bitcoin is limited above the strike price of the sold call options. The strategy aims to generate income regardless of whether Bitcoin’s price goes up, down, or sideways, although premium amounts will vary based on volatility and market conditions. This strategy is distinct from simply holding a spot Bitcoin ETF , which offers direct price participation but generates no inherent income. Potential Benefits of Investing in the BCCC The Global X Bitcoin Covered Call ETF ( BCCC ) offers several potential advantages for investors looking at the crypto market: Income Generation: The primary benefit is the potential for regular, specifically Weekly Income distributions, derived from the option premiums. This can be attractive for income-focused portfolios. Indirect Bitcoin Exposure: Investors gain exposure to the performance of Bitcoin without needing to directly buy, store, or secure the cryptocurrency itself. This simplifies access. Defined Strategy: The fund follows a clear, established Covered Call strategy, providing transparency on its income generation method. Managed Solution: Investors benefit from the expertise of Global X in managing the options strategy, saving them the complexity of executing covered calls themselves. ETF Structure: As an ETF, BCCC offers liquidity, ease of trading on exchanges, and potentially lower costs compared to actively managed funds or complex individual options trading. These benefits position BCCC as an alternative way to access the Bitcoin market, focusing on income rather than pure price speculation. Considerations and Potential Drawbacks While attractive for income, the Global X BCCC is not without its limitations and risks, inherent in the Covered Call strategy: Limited Upside Participation: By selling call options, the fund caps its potential gains if the price of Bitcoin rises significantly above the strike price of the sold options. This means BCCC might underperform a spot Bitcoin ETF in a strong bull market. Volatility Impact: While volatility can increase option premiums (benefiting income), extreme volatility can also lead to significant price swings in the underlying exposure, impacting the fund’s net asset value (NAV). Premium Variability: The amount of income generated can fluctuate significantly based on market volatility, interest rates, and the supply/demand for options. There is no guarantee of consistent or specific income levels. Indirect Exposure: The fund holds Bitcoin ETPs, not physical Bitcoin. While providing exposure, this introduces counterparty risk associated with the underlying ETPs. Management Fees: Like all ETFs, BCCC will have management fees, which will offset some of the income generated. Investors considering BCCC should carefully weigh the benefits of income generation against the potential for capped upside and the risks associated with both Bitcoin and options trading. Who Might the Global X BCCC Be Suitable For? The Global X Bitcoin Covered Call ETF ( BCCC ) is likely to appeal to a specific type of investor: Income Seekers: Individuals or institutions prioritizing regular income streams from their investments. Diversifiers: Investors looking to add a different type of exposure to digital assets that focuses on income rather than just capital appreciation. Conservative Crypto Investors: Those interested in the Bitcoin market but seeking a potentially less volatile approach than direct ownership or leveraged products, willing to sacrifice some upside for income and potentially reduced volatility (though significant volatility risk remains). ETF Users: Investors comfortable with the ETF structure for ease of trading and portfolio management. It is less suitable for investors whose primary goal is maximizing exposure to Bitcoin’s potential price appreciation or those who prefer direct ownership of cryptocurrencies. Actionable Insights for Potential Investors If the Global X Bitcoin Covered Call ETF ( BCCC ) aligns with your investment goals, here are some steps and considerations: Understand the Strategy: Ensure you fully grasp how a Covered Call works and its implications for both income generation and potential capital appreciation limits. Evaluate Your Goals: Determine if generating Weekly Income from a Bitcoin-related product fits within your overall investment strategy and risk tolerance. Research the Underlying ETPs: While you don’t hold them directly, understand which ETPs Global X uses for underlying exposure in BCCC . Consider Fees: Factor in the expense ratio of the ETF, as it will impact the net income received. Consult a Financial Advisor: Discuss whether BCCC is appropriate for your specific financial situation and portfolio. Monitor Performance: Track not just the income distributions but also the change in the fund’s Net Asset Value (NAV) over time, as total return includes both. Investing in BCCC involves exposure to the volatile cryptocurrency market combined with the complexities of options trading. Due diligence is essential. Global X’s Role in the ETF Landscape Global X has a history of launching innovative and thematic ETFs. Their move to introduce BCCC demonstrates a commitment to exploring different strategies within the rapidly evolving digital asset investment landscape. By offering a Covered Call strategy via an ETF, they are providing a structured product that brings an established income-generating technique to the Bitcoin market, catering to a specific investor demand for yield. Comparing BCCC to Other Bitcoin Investment Options It’s helpful to see how BCCC stacks up against other ways to invest in Bitcoin: Feature Global X BCCC Spot Bitcoin ETF Direct Bitcoin Ownership Primary Goal Income Generation + Indirect Exposure Price Tracking + Direct Exposure Price Tracking + Direct Ownership Income Potential High (via premiums) None None Upside Participation Limited (capped by strike price) Full Full Complexity Moderate (understanding strategy) Low Moderate (wallets, security) Access Method Brokerage Account (ETF) Brokerage Account (ETF) Exchanges, Wallets Covered Call Strategy Yes No Requires active trading This table highlights that BCCC occupies a unique niche, focusing on Weekly Income through a specific strategy, distinct from the direct price exposure offered by other methods. Summary: A New Way to Access Bitcoin Income The launch of the Global X Bitcoin Covered Call ETF ( BCCC ) represents an interesting development in the accessibility of digital asset strategies for traditional investors. By utilizing a Covered Call approach on Bitcoin ETPs, Global X aims to provide shareholders with potential Weekly Income distributions. While it offers the benefit of income generation and indirect Bitcoin exposure without the complexities of direct ownership or individual options trading, investors must be aware of the strategy’s inherent limitation on upside potential and the risks associated with market volatility. For those seeking income from the crypto space and understanding the trade-offs, BCCC could be a valuable addition to their investment toolkit, offering a structured and managed way to pursue yield in the dynamic world of Bitcoin. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin ETF trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption . This post Unlock Weekly Income with Global X’s New Bitcoin Covered Call ETF (BCCC) first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: 24-Year-Old Arrested for Allegedly Masterminding Several High-Profile Crypto Kidnappings in France: Report
body: The suspected mastermind behind a string of kidnappings targeting cryptocurrency entrepreneurs in France has reportedly been arrested in Morocco. According to a new Barron’s report, Moroccan law enforcement apprehended Badiss Mohamed Amide Bajjou, a 24-year-old Franco-Moroccan man, after an Interpol red notice was issued for him by French authorities over kidnapping allegations. France has been reeling from a series of kidnappings and attempted abductions of crypto investors and their families in recent months. The suspect was arrested in the northern Moroccan city of Tangier, as per a statement from the Moroccan General Directorate for National Security. French Justice Minister Gerald Darmanin praised the arrest in a post on the social media platform X. “I sincerely thank Morocco for this arrest, which demonstrates excellent judicial cooperation between our two countries, particularly in the fight against organized crime.” According to French publication Le Parisien, authorities believe that Bajjou might have organized several kidnappings and abduction attempts from abroad, including January’s kidnapping of David Balland, a co-founder of French crypto firm Ledger, and his wife. Balland, who was eventually rescued by law enforcement, had his finger cut off by his kidnappers as they demanded a ransom. Bajjou is also being investigated for his possible involvement in a series of kidnappings or attempted kidnappings in May, including the viral incident shared on social media, when masked men attempted to kidnap the pregnant daughter of cryptocurrency entrepreneur Pierre Noizat, but were fought off. title: Rumours BlackRock Are Planning To File For An XRP ETF, Could This Be The Catalyst Price Needs To Break $3?
body: Whispers in financial circles suggest that BlackRock might be eyeing an XRP ETF. If true this could flip the script for XRP price helping to inject fresh liquidity and drawing institutional players hungry for crypto exposure. Sitting a little above $2, XRP’s next move hinges on whether these rumors materialize but let’s be real, when the world’s largest asset manager dips its toes in, waves follow. Why a BlackRock XRP ETF Changes Everything With its recent resurgence, owing to either winning or settling different litigations with the SEC, XRP is now again the star child of the crypto sector. With major hurdles by the SEC starting to clear up months ago, many speculated that BlackRock would file an XRP ETF. XRP price reviving after regulatory clarity. Graph Source: CoinMarketCap What’s the potential impact, you ask? Imagine traditional investors—the kind who still fax trade orders—gaining easy access to XRPwithout wrestling with private keys or crypto exchanges. That’s the promise of an ETF. Suddenly, pension funds and hedge managers could pile in, turbocharging demand. More importantly, it will stamp XRP with Wall Street’s seal of approval, nudging skeptics toward adoption. The same happened with Bitcoin when its first ETF was approved. In a historic move, Bitcoin broke its (then) ATH before halving, a first for BTC. If the XRP ETF follows the trajectory of BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF, the XRP price is predicted to explode, even passing the $3 level. While BlackRock’s XRP ETF may not be the first to be filed, as Franklin Templeton, Grayscale, and 21Shares are already in on it, BlackRock’s filing is a major move. The world’s largest asset manager did not rush for the filing, citing regulatory uncertainty initially. But if the speculations are true, this means that, regulation-wise, BlackRock is now confident in the crypto’s performance, potentially eying major XRP price movements. XRP Price Charts: The Path to $3, or $1? While the fundamentals are strong, technical indicators paint a different picture for the XRPprice. At the 1D chart, the RSI is around 42 , signalling neutral territory. On the other hand, a weekly chart view shows XRP price going through a rough few days, down more than 5%. The more you look at the technical indicators, the more the XRP price view is mixed. 20 Day MAs and lower say sell, but the 50 Day EMA and beyond are signalling a buying opportunity. Different XRP MA, Different Signals. Source: TipRanks So the question on everybody’s mind is: will BlackRock’s ETF filing be what XRP really needs? No one can predict the future, but if XRP ETF follows Bitcoin’s trajectory, $3 is a real possibility. On the other hand, if XRP price breaks down (as technical indicators show a chance of), XRP may go down in the mid-term to as low as $1.7, perhaps even $1. Jittery Traders See Another PayFi Genius As Safe Haven XRP was developed to ease the banking system. Add in no FX fee and only 1% flat remittance fee to anywhere in the world, this PayFi solution’s RTX token has already jumped 440% in the presale . With experts believing Remittix to possess a winning formula, with some estimates saying it can grow over 20x once listed on major exchanges. title: Spacecoin Airdrop: Exciting Opportunity Unlocking Decentralized Internet Access
body: BitcoinWorld Spacecoin Airdrop: Exciting Opportunity Unlocking Decentralized Internet Access Are you ready to participate in a groundbreaking initiative that aims to reshape internet access? The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with news about the latest Spacecoin airdrop . This event isn’t just about receiving free tokens; it’s a strategic move by Spacecoin to propel its ambitious project: building a truly decentralized internet powered by innovative blockchain satellites . If you’re involved in the Creditcoin ecosystem , or simply interested in the future of decentralized technology, this is an event you won’t want to miss. Let’s dive into what this crypto airdrop entails and how you can get involved. What is the Spacecoin Airdrop All About? Spacecoin recently made a significant announcement regarding an upcoming token distribution event designed to reward early supporters and expand its community. This isn’t a random giveaway; it’s a carefully planned maneuver tied directly to the development and adoption of their decentralized internet project. The core idea is to leverage the existing community within the Creditcoin ecosystem, given potential synergies or shared technological foundations, though specific reasons for targeting Creditcoin holders haven’t been fully detailed yet. The airdrop serves multiple purposes: Community Growth: Attract new users and holders to the Spacecoin network. Awareness: Generate buzz and educate people about the decentralized internet initiative. Distribution: Get Spacecoin tokens into the hands of a wider audience, promoting decentralization of token ownership. Incentivization: Reward holders within a related ecosystem (Creditcoin) and encourage participation in Spacecoin’s future network. This Spacecoin airdrop is positioned as a crucial step in gathering momentum and support for a vision that extends beyond typical blockchain applications. Eligibility for the Spacecoin Airdrop: Are You Qualified? The primary target audience for this particular crypto airdrop comprises users holding specific eligible tokens or NFTs within the Creditcoin ecosystem . While Spacecoin’s main goal is the decentralized internet , their initial outreach is focused on this specific community. The exact list of eligible tokens and NFTs will be published closer to the airdrop date, but typically this means holding them in a non-custodial wallet where you control the private keys. Beyond simply holding assets, participation requires active engagement. To qualify, users must typically: Connect their eligible cryptocurrency wallets to the official Spacecoin airdrop portal. Complete specific social tasks. These often include following Spacecoin on social media platforms, joining their Telegram or Discord channels, retweeting announcements, or engaging with their content. These tasks are designed to increase Spacecoin’s online visibility and build a stronger community presence ahead of the decentralized internet launch. It’s essential to use only official links provided directly by Spacecoin’s verified channels to avoid scams. Always double-check URLs and never share your private keys. Fueling the Decentralized Internet Vision with Blockchain Satellites The ambitious core of Spacecoin’s plan is the creation of a decentralized internet infrastructure. This vision relies on deploying blockchain satellites that would presumably bypass traditional centralized internet service providers and infrastructure. The idea is that satellites could provide global coverage, while blockchain technology ensures censorship resistance, security, and decentralized control over the network. While the technical specifics of how these blockchain satellites will function and interact with the blockchain are still emerging, the concept is fascinating. It suggests a future where internet access could be more democratic, resistant to single points of failure, and potentially accessible in underserved regions. The Spacecoin airdrop is framed as a way to onboard the first wave of users and stakeholders who believe in and will potentially utilize this future decentralized network. Benefits and Actionable Steps for Airdrop Participants Participating in the Spacecoin airdrop offers several potential benefits: Receive Free Tokens: The most immediate benefit is acquiring Spacecoin tokens without direct purchase, potentially offering value if the project succeeds. Early Access/Involvement: Get in on the ground floor of a project with a bold vision for a decentralized internet . Gas Fee Subsidy: The announcement mentions a gas fee subsidy, which is a significant benefit, especially on networks with high transaction costs. This subsidy makes participation more accessible and less costly for users. Support a Vision: Contribute to the early growth of a project aiming for global decentralized connectivity via blockchain satellites . Here are the actionable steps you should take if you are interested and potentially eligible: Verify Eligibility: Check Spacecoin’s official announcements for the exact list of eligible Creditcoin ecosystem tokens or NFTs and snapshot dates (if applicable). Secure Your Wallet: Ensure your eligible assets are in a non-custodial wallet you control. Follow Official Channels: Find and follow Spacecoin’s official social media accounts (Twitter, Telegram, Discord, etc.). Be wary of impersonators. Prepare for Tasks: Be ready to connect your wallet via the official portal and complete the required social tasks once the airdrop mechanics are fully released. Stay Informed: Continuously monitor Spacecoin’s official communication channels for updates, deadlines, and instructions regarding the Spacecoin airdrop . Potential Challenges and Considerations While the prospect of a free crypto airdrop and a decentralized internet is exciting, it’s important to consider potential challenges: Project Execution Risk: Building a network of blockchain satellites is an incredibly complex and expensive undertaking with no guarantee of success. Market Volatility: The value of Spacecoin tokens received through the airdrop will be subject to the volatile cryptocurrency market. Scam Risk: Airdrops are frequently targeted by scammers. Always verify official sources and be cautious of requests for private keys or seed phrases. Adoption Hurdles: Even if built, achieving widespread adoption for a new decentralized internet infrastructure faces significant challenges. Eligibility Specifics: The exact rules for eligibility based on the Creditcoin ecosystem holdings might be complex or have specific requirements (e.g., minimum holding amounts, holding duration). Approach the airdrop with realistic expectations and prioritize security. Why This Airdrop Matters for the Decentralized Internet Dream Every crypto airdrop serves a purpose, and Spacecoin’s is clearly aimed at bootstrapping its ambitious project. By distributing tokens, they are creating initial network participants and potential users who have a vested interest in the success of the decentralized internet built on blockchain satellites . The focus on the Creditcoin ecosystem suggests a strategic partnership or alignment that could benefit both communities. This initiative represents a bold step towards imagining internet infrastructure differently. While the technological and logistical hurdles are immense, the vision of a global, censorship-resistant network free from centralized control is powerful. The airdrop is the initial spark intended to ignite interest and build the community necessary to potentially turn this vision into reality. Summary: Don’t Miss This Exciting Spacecoin Opportunity Spacecoin is launching an exciting Spacecoin airdrop aimed at users holding eligible tokens or NFTs from the Creditcoin ecosystem . This initiative is a foundational step in their ambitious plan to create a decentralized internet using blockchain satellites . Participants need to connect wallets via the official portal and complete social tasks to qualify, with the added benefit of a gas fee subsidy. While the vision is long-term and complex, this crypto airdrop provides an opportunity to get involved early and support a project pushing the boundaries of decentralized technology. Ensure you follow official instructions carefully and prioritize security to claim your potential tokens and join the journey towards a more decentralized online world. To learn more about the latest crypto airdrop opportunities and decentralized internet trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping the future of blockchain satellites and the wider Creditcoin ecosystem .
